caption.p: Identification of polyphenols from medicinal plant extracts. Polyphenols extracted from the medicinal plants Antirhea borbonica ( A), Ayapana triplinervis ( B), Terminalia bentzoe ( C), and Dodonaea viscosa ( D) were identified by Ultra-performance liquid chromatography coupled to electrospray ionization-tandem mass spectrometry analysis (UPLC-ESI-MS-MS) at 280 nm.
